## BufferedGeometryAccessor.(constructor)

Create an object of type `BufferedGeometryAccessor`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(object: THREE.Mesh, geometryType: GeometryType, bufferGeometry: THREE.BufferGeometry, stride: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | THREE.Mesh | mesh object |
|  geometryType | [GeometryType](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrytype.md) | type of geometry to be used |
|  bufferGeometry | THREE.BufferGeometry | which buffer geometry to use |
|  stride | number | geometry stride length |
